snippet: TweetPeek lets obsessive Twitter users post and read tweets wirelessly-and nothing else.
lead_paragraph: If you have an overwhelming need to tweet your every move, you'll have a hard time resisting TwitterPeek, a device that looks like a little like those low-cost phones designed with texting in mind, but it only sends messages to Twitter (of course, it lets you read them too).

headline.main: A Device Dedicated to Dedicated Tweeters

abstract: TweetPeek lets obsessive Twitter users post and read tweets wirelessly-and nothing else.

snippet: A device that looks a little like a low-cost phone made with texting in mind, but it sends messages only to Twitter.
lead_paragraph: If you have an overwhelming need to tweet your every move, you'll have a hard time resisting TwitterPeek, a device that looks a little like those low-cost phones made with texting in mind, but it sends messages only to Twitter (of course, it lets you read them too). The device is $100, which includes a year of service. After the first year there is a $7.95 a month subscription fee. Or you have the option of paying $200 for unlimited lifetime service. The TwitterPeek is a compact 4 inches tall by 2.7 inches wide by 0.4 inches thick. It weighs about 3.8 ounces.

headline.main: One Handy Way to Join An Endless Conversation

abstract: Gadgetwise column highlights TwitterPeek, gadget that sends text messages only to Twitter; photo (S)
